amendment.description: Page 80, after line 2, insert the following (and make such technical and conforming changes as may be appropriate): SEC. 747. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2011 et seq.).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 447).

action.text: Amendment (A048) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
